desc: Fair-trade, Sustainable & Cruelty Free. Body care, wellness & lifestyle products, mindfully created in Chiang Mai, Northern Thailand. Taking the finest herbs & traditional healing plants and adding a global touch. Massage oils, beeswax balms, spa products.

layout.text: 100% natural body care, wellness & lifestyle products. Fairly traded, sustainable and cruelty free,  from the mountains of Northern Thailand.  Bringing you traditional Thai herbs and ingredients with a global touch.
